channel.title: SWAT New Emote System
channel.description:
I get this error:
[code] Class36.java:23: cannot find symbol symbol : variable FileOperations location: class Class36 abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./cache/anim/"+file+".dat"); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Could anyone help?

item.title: SWAT New Emote System
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:1, topic:318521”]I get this error:

Class36.java:23: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable FileOperations
location: class Class36
        abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./cache/anim/"+file+".dat");
                 ^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Could anyone help?[/quote]

You need File Operations, I attached my File operations just paste in your client folder and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: SWAT New Emote System

item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:1, topic:318521”]I get this error:

Class36.java:23: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable FileOperations
location: class Class36
        abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./cache/anim/"+file+".dat");
                 ^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Could anyone help?[/quote]
Make a new file in your cache called “anim”.
Put there your animimations like 219.dat.
